**Guidelines:**
- [ ] It **is not** a duplicate issue.
- [ ] It **is not** a request to add a website. Write it here instead https://github.com/LagradOst/CloudStream-3/issues/24

- UI/UX enhancement
- New feature
- Other

**Describe your request here** *(fill this up)*
- [ ] How it works.
- [ ] Issues it solves.
- [ ] Why it is needed.
